name: XinEurope.com (a.k.a Revefrance) Ads removal
description: Remove ads and nuisances on bbs.xineurope.com (revefrance)
additional_info:
Clear:
* Floating images
* Banner ads
* Embedded 欧洲小报 and other ads
* Garbage suffixed text "www.xineurope.com" preventing copying
* Global and sub-global sticky posts
* All pinned posts
